name: Norton Ghost Image Segment
summary: Learn about .GHS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: In Symantec Ghost 6.5 and later, segment files use the naming convention "name001.ghs," "name002.ghs," "name003.ghs," etc.
NOTE: Norton Ghost was renamed as Ghost Solution Suite.

description: Segment of a disk image created with Norton Ghost that is spanned over several files; typically saved with other GHS file segments and a .GHO file, which contains the initial segment of the disk image.
